item.title: The Morellic Minikin
item.description: Overview The Morellic Minikin are an ethnic group native to Southern Tseireph. History

item.title: The Morellu
item.description: Overview The Morellu are an ethnicity tracing its origins to the neolithic minikin inhabitants of southern Tseireph. The Morellu primarily worship the Petrified Child, but also exhibit some traits of polytheism.
